scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:sass && npm run build:stylus
scripts.build:sass: mkdir -p lib/sass && ncp src/sass lib/sass && npm run bundle:sass
scripts.build:stylus: mkdir -p lib/stylus && ncp src/stylus lib/stylus && npm run bundle:stylus
scripts.bundle:sass:
cat ./src/sass/mixins/utils.scss ./src/sass/mixins/selectors.scss ./src/sass/mixins/alignments.scss ./src/sass/mixins/attributes.scss ./src/sass/mixins/boxes.scss ./src/sass/mixins/features.scss ./src/sass/mixins/media.scss ./src/sass/mixins/palette.scss ./src/sass/mixins/typography.scss ./src/sass/mixins/components.scss ./src/sass/minuet.scss ./src/sass/reset.scss > ./lib/minuet.bundle.scss && sed -i 's/^[[:space:]]*@import.*$//g;s/^[[:space:]]*\/\/.*$//g;s/^[[:space:]]*\/\*.*$//g;/^[[:space:]]*$/d' ./lib/minuet.bundle.scss && sed -i '1s/^/\/*! minuet, (c) Andrew Wei *\/\
/' ./lib/minuet.bundle.scss
scripts.bundle:stylus:
cat ./src/stylus/mixins/math.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/selectors.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/alignments.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/attributes.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/boxes.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/features.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/media.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/palette.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/typography.styl ./src/stylus/mixins/components.styl ./src/stylus/minuet.styl ./src/stylus/reset.styl > ./lib/minuet.bundle.styl && sed -i 's/^[[:space:]]*@import.*$//g;s/^[[:space:]]*\/\/.*$//g;s/^[[:space:]]*\/\*.*$//g;/^[[:space:]]*$/d' ./lib/minuet.bundle.styl && sed -i '1s/^/\/*! minuet, (c) Andrew Wei *\/\
/' ./lib/minuet.bundle.styl
scripts.play: rimraf playground/public && pug -w -O "{basedir:'playground/app/templates'}" -o playground/public playground/app/templates/views & webpack-dev-server --inline --hot --config playground/webpack.config.js --content-base playground/public --port 8080
scripts.test: echo "There are no tests in this package yet"
